name: v1.2.0 - Bug Fixes and Improvements
body:
## What's New in v1.2.0

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed PlantUML rendering issues
- Fixed file watcher errors
- Improved error handling

### Improvements
- Better performance for large files
- Reduced memory usage
- Faster startup time

### Technical Details
- Optimized WebView2 initialization
- Better async handling
- Improved logging

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nobiehl/mini-markdown-viewer/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0
